name: GrannyQuest
0:
”Alexa open granny quest”
”Alexa play granny quest”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: granny quest
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Guide the granny through challenging mazes!

Navigate her through 20 thrilling levels filled with obstacles.

Use commands: “Up, Down, Left, or Right”

Find the knitted jumper located somewhere on the grid in each level. Plan your moves and speak them out loud to ensure granny navigates safely through each challenging maze.

This game is perfect for players who enjoy puzzles and adventures. Are you ready to take on the challenge and lead her to her prized jumper? Jump into the action and demonstrate your navigation skills in this unique maze adventure!

This skill is supported on Echo Show and Fire TV.

This skill is part of Mini Games.

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Mini Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
